channel.title: Bought a laser off Amazon uk
channel.description:
bought a TOPDIGI 50mW Green Laser Pen Pointer =] for £19.99 + posting and packaging £4.50 Dispatch estimate:31 Jan 2011 - 1 Feb 2011 Delivery estimate:3 Feb 2011 - 7 Feb 2011
cant wait to burn some sheett
what do you think? worth the money?

item.title: Bought a laser off Amazon uk
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I never even thought of burning shit with one. I think you would need better than a $20 lazer to do that

Read full topic

naa to long also the laser’s radiation

[quote=“ranger squad, post:21, topic:380524”]If it’s a laser pointer pen, the most it will do is blind you.

(Oh yeah, you can get put in jail if you point it in the sky as it can blind the pilots.)[/quote]

il never do that also i saw on youtube it happened but they could not find the suspect

item.title: Bought a laser off Amazon uk
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:12, topic:380524”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=476354.msg3483668#msg3483668 date=1296368612]
I’m fairly confident that a tiny laser like that is not going to burn anything.
[/quote]

I’m kind of on that side too. If I remember correctly, a green laser that will actually burn nicely can get around $100+.[/quote]
Yeah to be able to burn something you have to spend a bit more money. In my Photonics classroom my teacher had a green laser than can give you a little burn if you hold your hand in front of it for 10 seconds or so, but that thing cost hundreds if I remember correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Bought a laser off Amazon uk
item.dc:creator: @The_Exclusive The Exclusive
item.description:
@The_Exclusive wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:7, topic:380524”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=476354.msg3483596#msg3483596 date=1296362719]
Wait until 3AM.
Look out your window.
Pop the tires of unsuspecting drivers.
Or, go to a kid’s birthday party place (Chuck E. Cheese, etc.) And hide behind something and start popping balloons.
[/quote]
or get some sharks and put the frickin’ laser beams on their heads

[/quote]lawl like the picture

Read full topic
